author: Piano Elf

text: Cyborg 009 is a classic manga/anime. I didn't play this game, but I heard it's an average action platformer. It does have some cool rocking tracks like this one though, which is always fitting for the genre. Gotta love the SNES sound.
author: SupraDarky

text: I played this one, there is an English translation online. It's not bad at all, especially for a licensed game, but I think that may be my bias toward the franchise. I will say that some of the cyborg powers are far more Oh-Pee than others, like Geronimo Jr who can tank hits and deliver them too.  Jet Link's pretty decent too since he's pretty much able to go over some stages with his flying if you know how to do it right.
author: George G-Man
